Articles.Content: For the benefit of anyone wanting to reenact a historic mission like Apollo or Mercury, I propose a simple toggle to switch between desplaying all units of measurement in the default metric and American Customary Measurements. Possibly a unique Kerbal one as well for the benefit of the fanfic writers.

I want the game to measure everything in roman digiti abd weight being measured in granum.

Tbh: No need here. Pretty much all science is done in metrics...

"The metric system is the tool of the devil! My car gets 40 rods to the hogshead and that's the way I likes it."

-Grampa Simpson

Although it would be a fun thing to have, I assume that the way the UI and everything else is currently set up does not have multiple units in mind--that considered, it would be a lot of work to add a switch for comparatively little benefit. It would probably have to have been in from the first design to be worth it.
